description: A notification is sent whenever the instance fault action is triggered.

event.Summary: Fault action triggered for VLLI instance $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliFaultTrap CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceGrpId i 1 CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceId i 1 CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceGroupName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Instance Group ID which the instance belongs to.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceGrpId

description: Instance level Id used as index in the instance level entry.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceId

description: The group level name associated with
variables.name: CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceGroupName

description: The instance level name associated with
variables.name: CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceName

description: A notification is sent whenever the instance recovery action is triggered.

event.Summary: Recovery action triggered for VLLI instance $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliRecoveryTrap CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceGrpId i 1 CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceId i 1 CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceGroupName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-VLLI-MIB::cienaCesVlliInstanceName s EXAMPLE
